Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, I have a problem with bdarmory. The problem is whenever i launch a craft on either to launchpad or runway the screen is all black. In addition to the screen being black, the altitude gauge is blank, the speed reads: "0.000000m/s", and the time reads the maximum time (999 years or something like that). My other mods are the B9 parts pack, adjustable landing gear, aviation lights, BD parts pack, better burn time, chatterer, firespitter, KER, KSP AVC, KW rocektry, spaceY heavy lifters and parts pack. Does anyone know how to fix this? Im on ubuntu 16.04 with 8gb ram, and ksp 1.1.3.

 

-MadRussian42

Edited July 2, 2016 by MadRussian42
